analyzed: mgo la gtor ba dang / dpral bar thig le dang / lce la sngags kyis 'thor 'thung bya ste /

analyzed: gtor ma'i snod nas bcom ldan 'das ma la lan gsum phul la /

analyzed: bi ra shu ma mu'i sa bon bcu po de dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa can du rnam par bltas la /

analyzed: de'i steng du aom dkar po'i kha chod bltas te /
translated: Look at the white OṂ on top of that.

original: rlung g-yos pas me 'bar zhing /

analyzed: gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug nas rab tu zhugs te /

analyzed: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pas bdud rtsir gyur te /

original: bsil bar 'gyur bar blta'o //
